original_text: He went up to the entrance of the king's gate, for no one was allowed to enter the king's gate clothed in sackcloth.
korean_text: 대궐 문 앞까지 이르렀으니 굵은 베 옷을 입은 자는 대궐 문에 들어가지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: He went up to the entrance of the king's gate
for no one was allowed to enter the king's gate
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 아무도 왕의 문에 들어갈 수 없었습니다.
